caption: The photograph captures a lush green wheat field. The wheat stalks are prominently shown, with their heads nearing maturity. The photo focuses closely on the crop, filling the frame from edge to edge with these plants. The background reveals a clear blue sky with no clouds, suggesting a bright and sunny day. The perspective is slightly low, emphasizing the height and density of the wheat stalks, while the depth of field focuses sharply on the wheat in the foreground, with a gradual blur toward the background. The overall composition conveys a sense of abundant growth and the vibrancy of agricultural life.
title: Spring wheat
